message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a steal at twice its worth, and I'm confident you'll love it. If you're interested, I can give you a quick rundown of its features and benefits. What do you say?
I'll take it. Since you've assured me it's high-quality and the price is lower than its value to me, I have no reason to pass on this deal.
